SS lurches in pain as his shoulder is hit but grabs the sword hand in 
his mouth.

OOC: Gotta' give me credit for cutting my losses when I recieve 
damage.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> The pain surges as one of his heads is bitten, and then shot with
> energy. It is nearly blown off. 
> "Arrgggggg! Epyon, MAXIMIZE!"
> He transformes the one mouth still holding onto SS. That mouth is 
not a
> foot, but still clamped on. Epyon grabs hold of SS. He draws his 
saber
> again, and starts slashing and pokeing at SS.
